metadata.title: CVE-2016-9085 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple integer overflows in libwebp allows attackers to have unspecifiedimpact via unknown vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9085` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwebp6 - 0.6.1-2
libwebpdemux2 - 0.6.1-2
libwebpmux3 - 0.6.1-2
webp - 0.6.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libwebp package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.1-2').
